_general_settings_system_title.comment: group label for settings that configure Teams integration with the underlying Operation System (e.g. auto-start Teams on OS startup, run app in background when closed)
_general_settings_system_auto_start_togg: Label for checkbox that, when checked, will cause Teams to automatically launch when the user starts up their machine
_notification_settings_details_message_p: group label for preview settings for notifications
_notification_settings_edit_chat_button_: aria label for edit chat notifications
_notification_settings_details_chat_mess: text for Messages and replies banner setting in custom chat notifications settings.
notification_settings_warning_windows_tf: Double check your Windows notification settings to ensure you're able to receive Teams notifications. <0></0>
_notification_settings_warning_windows_t: String to present to the user the fact the windows settings might override some choice made in teams settings pane
_settings_loader_text.comment: Text to be shown along with the loader before settings page loads
_dropdown_settings_selected_text.comment: text to be announced when a value is selected from the dropdown
read_receipts_description: Let people know when you’ve seen their messages and know when they’ve seen yours. Close and reopen any chat windows for the setting to take effect in those chats.
